dmca.title: DMCA Complaint from Up to Date on BLOGGER
dmca.body:
CMS Hasche Sigle
Rechtsanwalte Steuerberater

CMS Hasche Sigle 
Partnerschafl von Rochtsanwalten
und Steuerberafern

Stadthausbrucke 1-3
D-20355 Hamburg

Tel.: +49 (0)40/3 76 30-0
Fax: +49 (0)40/3 76 30 40-600
www.cms-hs.com

Deutsche Bank AG Hamburg
BLZ 200 700 00
Ktc. 484 727 300

Dr. Hermann Lindhorst
Our ref.: LH-ce-2006/15700
Office: Christa Eichler
Tel.: +49 (0)40/3 76 30-325 
Fax: +49 (0)40/3 76 30-40579
hermann.lindhorst@cms-hs.com

Google, Inc. 
Attn: Blogger Legal. Support, DMCA complaints
1600 Amphithatre Pkwy
Mountain View CA 94043  

USA 

Via Facsimile: 001-650-618-2680 

17 October 2006 

Blogger "Anuvinu" - Violation of Terms of Services

Dear Sirs, 
We are writing to you in the name of and acting under authority of our client UpToDate, Inc. (www.uptodate.com). We make reference to a fax we sent to you on 13 October 2006 and to an e-mail we received yesterday, which is attached hereto. 

1. Our client is a leading provider of clinical medical information and offers several products on the internet, CD-ROM and Pocket PC. For further details of these products please refer to http://www.uptodate.com/service/index.asp.

Our client recently became aware of a website offering one of our software products and enabling users to download, the software via hyperlink. The permanent link of the infringing website is

http://anuvinu.blogspot.com/2006/08/uptodate-medical-reference.html

This does not only facilitate copyright infringement, but is also an infringement of your Terms of service. We explicitly refer to the Terms of Service for Biogger.com (especially to Sec. 6b.
